# Lab2
## Task1
```r
v <- rnorm(100)
v[10]
[1] 0.7822216
```

```r
v[10:20]
 [1]  0.7822216 -0.9205010  0.5104552  2.1134684  0.9666132  1.3632690  0.6737650  0.3916574 -0.6039227 -1.7733109
[11] -1.3512302
```

```r
v[20:(20+10)]
 [1] -1.35123016  0.80228692  1.25205815  0.64311435 -0.72944234 -0.09667777 -1.67843438 -0.19044020 -0.33817557
[10] -0.63805083  0.40490669
```

## Task2
```r
y <- data.frame(a = rnorm(100), b = 1:100, cc = sample(letters, 100, replace = TRUE))
print(tail(y, 10))
             a   b cc
91  -0.1943210  91  u
92   0.5558010  92  j
93   0.7312972  93  d
94  -0.2898437  94  g
95   1.1553411  95  g
96  -1.2392518  96  i
97  -0.5876974  97  t
98   0.3022105  98  r
99  -1.6447002  99  b
100 -0.5540098 100  b
```
 
```r
y[10:20,]
             a  b cc
10 -0.64000846 10  v
11 -1.42919088 11  m
12  0.94423336 12  d
13 -0.13425370 13  z
14  0.68225801 14  h
15  0.12776707 15  h
16 -0.36083626 16  k
17 -0.05713882 17  t
18 -1.24745193 18  b
19 -0.66015316 19  v
20 -0.40224004 20  p
```
 
```r
y[10, "b"]
[1] 10
```

```r
y$cc
  [1] o u r b j w j g r v m d z h h k t b v p c v t f j k b r u s a p m m i r t g s p v n l k y w g o v e n c n e
 [55] t r z e n b q p l x y x k x k u l l o w z e q c n w g y k b n n t j k y u j d g g i t r b b
Levels: a b c d e f g h i j k l m n o p q r s t u v w x y z
```

## Task3
```r
z <- c(1, 2, 3, NA, 4, NA, 5, NA)
z[!is.na(z)]
[1] 1 2 3 4 5
```

```r
mean(z, na.rm = TRUE)
[1] 3
```

```r
mean(z)
[1] NA
```
